struct.exostring: // DIALOGUE // when ahlan is waiting to see the jedi council

// SCRIPTED // when ahlan is confronting the jedi council
Dialog Mission Statement These dialogs are the conversation files for Ahlan Matale in the Jedi Enclave. Before the player becomes a Padawan, Ahlan is sitting in a waiting room in the Enclave. Once the player does become a Padawan (see zhar13 for more details) Ahlan is moved fromthe waiting room to the council chambers. The next time the player enters the Council chambers, Ahlan, Vandar and Vrook will be there and the first dialog will initiate.
Exit point in conversation:
Exit stream 1: No matter what choice the player makes they are given this quest and told to do it. DAN_PLOT_ROMANCE is set to 1 to show that the quest has been activated. Upon saying his final line, Ahlan exits the room and is removed from Module 13.
Exit stream 2: The line is said and the dialog ends.
